EmailTemplate.name: Birthday Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Birthday of "{!Account.Name}" due in 2 days !!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Team,
As per our Advisor factory, {!Account.Name}'s birthday is due in just two days !!
Please let us all endeavour to make it meaningful in any little way as possible.
Herein is the link of the same:{!Account.Link}
